## Keymap.pushScope() method

Push a scope onto the scope stack, setting it as the active scope to handle all key events.

**Signature:**

```typescript
pushScope(scope: Scope): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>scope</code> | [`Scope`]() |  |

**Returns:**

`void`
